title: League of Legends 2-D Fighting game (Like Mortal Kombat)

replies.body: Thank you for the support anonymous person c:
Oh yes, you are very welcome, other anonymous person c:

That sounds like a fantastic idea
Good job :)

They are still in works of development but its exactly what you're talking about.
